sentences: Elliot Mason (born 13 January 1977) is an English jazz trombonist.
Born in Norwich, England, Elliot was a young talent, playing in clubs as early as age eleven.
The following year, Elliot and his brother Brad (trumpet), won the national Daily Telegraph competition for a second time.
Mason was a featured soloist during the JLCO 2009 premiere tour, which originally aired on PBS.
He also won the International Trombone Workshop's "Under 29" Jazz Trombone competition in 1995.
